name: Greenflower Meadows
description: Gentle rolling fields and sparse Sproutfolk patrols. Ideal for learning combat, farming basic materials, and following your Sparrow to early Tales.
highlights: Good place to experiment with Soul Mode safely
Nearby World Trees for early map reveal

name: Twilight Thickets
description: Dense forest pockets where Sproutfolk Raiders and Ode patrols occasionally overlap. Vision is limited, making ambushes common.
highlights: Mixed enemy patrols for learning crowd control
Stronger resource nodes for upgraded gear
Great stealth practice with Soul Mode pathing

name: Emberbreak Ridge
description: Rocky escarpments exposed to Ode enforcement. Perfect for testing shield builds, ranged options, and vertical navigation.
highlights: Challenging Ode units ideal for learning counter windows
Good place to push your current build before a full respec
